text: Malik (born William Tai; 2 January 1948 - 11 December 2020) was a French-born Belgian comics artist. He was born in Paris. He drew many works under the pseudonym Phénix. He was best known for his works with Bédéadult and Cupidon. Malik died on 11 December 2020 from injuries caused by a house fire in Wallonia, Belgium at the age of 72.Le papa de Cupidon, Malik, décède dans un incendie à Ramillies ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from fire Category:Belgian comics artists Category:Artists from Paris
